channel.title: The Centresource Podcast
channel.itunes:subtitle: Demystifying tech decision-making
channel.itunes:summary: Two developers and a human being discuss the difficult world of technology, business, and building software that matters.
channel.description: Two developers and a human being discuss the difficult world of technology, business, and building software that matters.
channel.itunes:author: Centresource Interactive Agency
channel.itunes:keywords: technology, software development, startups, tech culture, apps

item.title: Ep 1: Platforms vs Custom Development
item.itunes:subtitle: You've got deadlines, budget constraints, and incredible ambitions. Do you build your software on a platform that's already out there? Or do you develop everything from scratch? That choice plays an important role in the future of your company, and we'll help you understand the questions involved.
